entry.dcterms:description: The research looked in 1991 at developments in people's safety of existence. It tried to answer the question of how the safety of existence of individuals and families was influenced by the economic, social and political changes; it also looked at whether the various components of the safety of existence changed, workplace safety, the safety of retaining current income, the safety of maintaining one's domicile etc. The research also tried to identify strategies employed by individuals and families in difficult life situations. Data recording was repeated in the third year of the longitudinal research.
